DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , control trial design examine efficacy oral misoprostol labor augmentation compare standard regimen intravenous oxytocin .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Oral Misoprostol Labor Augmentation
DOC.criteria: Clinical decision augment labor Gestational age > equal 36 week Singleton gestation Cephalic presentation Reassuring fetal heart rate trace Cervical dilation 4 8 cm Ruptured membrane clear amniotic fluid Intrauterine pressure catheter place Less 200 MVUs 10 minute period 5 few contraction 10 minute period English Spanish speak patient Nonreassuring fetal heart rate tracing time enrollment Meconium stain amniotic fluid Previous uterine incision Maternal fever ( define great 37.9 C ) Known fetal anomaly Placenta previa unexplained vaginal bleeding Estimated fetal weight 4,500 gram Abnormal maternal bony pelvis Grandmultiparity
